'''1.7.10 Build 5''' is the fifth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released in 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
* Sometimes when running a 1.6.4 world in 1.7.10 server asks for user to confirm something. Added a message box instead of console command confirmation.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Commands]]'''
* Students can now use {{cmd|msg}} command.

== Fixes ==
'''4 bugs fixed'''
* Custom skins (Mojang account login).
* Students being able to place blocks on top of disallow blocks with shift clicking a button for example.
* Students being able to interact with item frames on top of build disallow blocks.
* Gray background on macs in server assigmnents.
